amendment.description: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to improve tax equity for military personnel, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 1829 ruled out of order by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1829.
Amendment SA 1829 proposed by Senator Lincoln. (consideration: CR S12582-12585) To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to improve tax equity for military personnel, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1829 proposed by Senator Lincoln.
